channel.title: Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Community Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft Teams on Microsoft 365 Community Blog

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 10th of March, 2022
item.description: Latest news from Microsoft engineering on Microsoft 365 topics; Three demos: Siddharth Vaghasia – My Emails Viva Connections Adaptive Card Extension, Yves Habersaat – Getting started with Microsoft Graph Toolkit and SharePoint Framework, Paolo Pialorsi – Using Microsoft Graph APIs in Viva Connection ACEs

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 156 - João Ferreira
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by Portugal based, technologist, author, MVP Office Dev and Windows Insider, João Ferreira (Beezy).

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 8th of March, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 8th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 1st of March, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from March 1st, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework Community Call – 27th of January, 2022
item.description: Viva Connections & SharePoint Framework bi-weekly community call recording from January 27th is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.ms/m365pnp/videos. You can use SharePoint Framework for building solutions for Microsoft Teams and SharePoint Online

item.title: Microsoft 365 Platform Call – 25th of January, 2022
item.description: Microsoft 365 Platform Community Call - weekly community call recording from January 25th, is now available from the Microsoft 365 Community YouTube channel at http://aka.

item.title: Microsoft 365 PnP Weekly - Episode 150 - Anoop Tatti (Content+Cloud)
item.description: In this installment of the weekly discussion revolving around the latest news and topics on Microsoft 365, hosts – Vesa Juvonen (Microsoft), Waldek Mastykarz (Microsoft) are joined by London, UK-based SharePoint developer architect and MVP, Anoop Tatti (Content+Cloud)
